title: Why do chests contain shards for things you already own?
body: Yea, I know you get free chests. But guess what? You can also purchase them with RP. I get that the content is supposed to be random, but if you're buying something with REAL MONEY the least they can do is give you something you don't already own. It's stupid when you get something like a Jax shard (assuming you already own Jax).

replies.body:
No it's not.

1. its a company trying to make money.
2. No one forces you to buy chest.
3. Everyone has the knowledge you have a change to receive something you already own, so its the person whose willing to spend money's fault.

Also its an RNG system. tons of games have them and people love it. The thrill of getting something you don't have vs something you do have is a rush for people. It's all about Risk vs reward, if it was purely rewards it wouldn't be as fun.
